sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Reducing Cervical Cancer and Saving Lives Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Reducing Cervical Cancer and Saving Lives Act.

sections.heading: Applicability. This Act applies to a hospital, outpatient department, clinic, mobile unit, or other entity that provides cervical cancer screening services in the State of Illinois
sections.text: Applicability. This Act applies to a hospital, outpatient department, clinic, mobile unit, or other entity that provides cervical cancer screening services in the State of Illinois.
